Welcometo Gaming 101

So you're new to gaming?

Welcome to the ultimate guide to gaming! Within these pages you will find marvelous things that are required for a good gamer to succeed. We have all things gaming, such as info about the games themselves, how they came to be in this day and age, amongst a plethora of things. So come, weary traveler and learn about the splendid world of gaming!

Álvaro
